name: Cosma
description:
Core Agent functionality for building LLM-powered agents with answer.ai cosette and OpenAI API. Cosma is a library for building LLM-powered agents using cosette. It provides:
- A simple Agent class for creating tool-using LLM agents
- Production-ready logging and metrics collection
- Support for Anthropic’s recommended workflow patterns

affiliation.name: Laboratory for Assured AI Application Development (LA3D), Center for Research Computing, University of Notre Dame
